data.comment: In the minute 9, Wycombe take a 1-0 lead thanks to Scott Kashket.
The first-half has come to a close in Wycombe.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Jed Wallace.
In the minute 63, Goal! Millwall have got their heads in front thanks to a Ryan Leonard strike.
The home team replace Alex Samuel with Adebayo Akinfenwa.
Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's second substitution at Adams Park with Daryl Horgan replacing Fred Onyedinma.
In the minute 75, Josh Knight (Wycombe) has received a first yellow card.
Anis Mehmeti is replacing Dennis Adeniran for Wycombe at Adams Park.
Millwall make their first substitution with Ben Thompson replacing Tom Bradshaw.
Shane Ferguson is on a sub for Connor Mahoney for Millwall.
Alex Pearce is replacing Matt Smith for the away team.
